Basics

Just some simple JS demo's. One demo to compare to values and display messaging, the other to iterate through and count characters.

Things to note:

  • Have used const / let instead of var in places
  • Use of if statements to compare properties and display messaging
  • Use of a for loop to iterate through a sentence, if the letter at index matches the user input then increment letter count

Capacity status

Enter the number of passengers and the capacity to see one message, if the capacity is less than the number of passengers a different message will appear.
